misc: Doubles as a professional model as his side hustle
Few players dare to give him lip due to his intimidating presence and wrestling skills
biography: Olli, a formidable presence on the greens, brings a unique blend of athleticism and quiet intensity to the Hector Trophée. Representing Helsingin Golfklubi, Olli's imposing figure and rumored wrestling skills often leave his competitors hesitant to challenge his decisions, giving him a psychological edge on the course.
Beyond golf, Olli balances his time as a professional model. His sense of style and poise is evident both on and off the course.

Having participated in 7 previous Hector Trophée tournaments, Olli is still seeking his first victory in the prestigious pair competition. He also hopes to one day add a Victor Trophy to his accolades. Hector Trophée 2025 will mark his eighth appearance in the tournament.
